entries.rct_basic: The main starship reactor provides power for all internal components.
entries.cms_0: Countermeasure launchers fire special anti-tracking ordnance to confuse incoming guided missiles.
entries.wpn_1: Ordnance launchers can fire missile weapon types at locked targets.
entries.wpn_0: Starship weapons encompass energy-based blasters, ion cannons, and projectile weapons such as slug-throwers.
entries.ddi_0: This interface provides a hardware link between your droid and your internal starship systems.
entries.bst_0: Boosters are rechargeable ion engine over-drivers that enhance speed when they are engaged.
entries.cap_0: The capacitor draws power from the main reactor and stores it for the operation of starship weaponry.
entries.arm_0: Armor absorbs weapon fire and protects fragile ship components.
entries.shd_0: Shield generators create a protective energy field around your starship which dissipates when hit by enemy weapons.
entries.eng_0: The engine system provides the starship with thrust to maneuver in space.
